title: NDA Volunteer Information Demo
description: Demonstrates handling of volunteered information where the user provides answers before being asked. Shows IBDM's ability to accommodate unsolicited information and adjust the question sequence.
business_narrative: This scenario demonstrates IBDM's intelligent handling of 'over-answering' - when users provide more information than requested. Unlike rigid chatbots that ignore extra information, IBDM recognizes and accommodates volunteered facts, avoiding redundant questions. This creates a more natural, efficient dialogue that respects the user's time.
larsson_algorithms: Belief Accommodation (Rule 4.3) - System accommodates volunteered information
Question Reaccommodation (Rule 4.5) - System removes questions that are now answered
Dynamic QUD Management - Issues resolved without explicit asking
Plan Adaptation - Skip questions that volunteered info already answered

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to draft a mutual NDA between Acme Corp and TechStart for California
turns.business_explanation: User provides the main request PLUS volunteers three pieces of information (parties, NDA type, jurisdiction) unprompted. This tests IBDM's ability to extract multiple facts from a single utterance.

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: I understand you need a mutual NDA between Acme Corp and TechStart, governed by California law. What is the effective date?
turns.business_explanation: System acknowledges the volunteered information (building trust) and asks the NEXT relevant question, skipping the three already-answered questions. This demonstrates intelligent question management.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: January 15, 2025, and we need it for 5 years
turns.business_explanation: User again volunteers extra information - provides duration along with the date. IBDM should recognize both facts.

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: Perfect. I now have all the information needed. To confirm: mutual NDA between Acme Corp and TechStart, effective January 15, 2025, 5-year confidentiality period, governed by California law. Shall I generate the draft?
turns.business_explanation: System confirms all information collected and asks for permission to proceed. Notice the dialogue completed in 4 turns instead of 12 - 67% reduction due to volunteered information.

metrics.dialogue_efficiency: 167% - Completed in 5 turns vs 12 baseline (58% reduction)
metrics.user_experience: Excellent - System respects user's time by not asking redundant questions
metrics.system_transparency: High - Acknowledges what was understood from volunteered info

business_value: This demonstrates a key competitive advantage: IBDM's belief accommodation allows power users to provide information rapidly, while the system intelligently tracks what's been said. Traditional slot-filling chatbots would still ask all 5 questions sequentially, ignoring the volunteered information.
